A

adjustCoordinate_X(double) - Method in class base.app.AppModel
adjusts the x-coordinate of all Points existing according to the ratio of the alteration of the stage's window width.
adjustCoordinate_Y(double) - Method in class base.app.AppModel
adjusts the y-coordinate of all Points existing according to the ratio of the alteration of the stage's window height.
AppController - Class in base.app
 
AppController(AppModel, AppView) - Constructor for class base.app.AppController
public constructor, handling following events: - displaying value of slider after slider was moved - starting process of adding new points to the painting - terminating process of adding new points to the painting - rearranging controls after window width was changed - rearranging controls after window height was changed
AppModel - Class in base.app
 
AppModel() - Constructor for class base.app.AppModel
Constructor
approximatePi() - Method in class base.app.Cheater
Approximates Pi with each call of this method more precisely.
approximatePi(double) - Static method in class base.app.Cheater
Approximates Pi according to the number of runs given.
AppView - Class in base.app
 
AppView(Stage, AppModel) - Constructor for class base.app.AppView
